audioText: Nous avons suffisamment de temps pour finir le projet.
question: Nous avons suffisamment de temps pour finir le projet.
options: No, they don't have enough time.
explanation: The text states 'Nous avons suffisamment de temps pour finir le projet' - We have enough time to finish the project. The adverb 'suffisamment' means sufficiently/enough, indicating they have adequate time. The distractors test confusion about the amount of time available.
